title: Everything You Need. All Right Here.
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Huntington Apartments', 'The Huntington is located between Wadsworth and Kipling.', 'If you are coming from Denver just take highway 6th West Bound.', 'Exit Wadsworth South bound.', 'Turn West on W. Girton Ave.', 'Turn Left or South of S. Ammons St. Right or West on W. Floyd Ave.', 'The leasing office is located on the right hand side.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 1010 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Stainless Steel Appliance Packages*', '- Ceiling Fans*', '- Newly Upgraded interiors', '- Personal Balcony or Patio*', '- Central Air Conditioning and Heat', '- Wired for Technology', '- In Home Washer and Dryer', '- Oak Cabinetry', '- Pet Yards*', '- Cathedral Ceilings with Skylights*', '- Linen Closets*', '- Dishwashers', '- Spacious Walk-in Closets', '- Wood Burning Fireplaces', '- Designer Two-Tone Paint*', '- Energy Star Appliances', 'Community Amenities', '- On-Site Laundry Facility', '- Basketball Court', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '- Community Grill', '- Business Center', '- Carports', '- Convenient Access to I-25, E-470, I-70', '- Breathtaking Mountain Views', '- Access to Walking and Biking Paths', '- Fitness Center', '- Adjoining Sister City Park', '- Fire Pit', '- Green Friendly Community', '- Minutes from Red Rocks Amphitheatre', '- Resort-Inspired Pool and Year-round Spa', '- Tennis Court', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed', 'Comments: We welcome your furry friends here at The Huntington!', 'Max weight is not to exceed 80 lbs for both pets.', 'Restrictions: Breed restrictions do apply.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:12:00PM-5:00PM', 'The Huntington Apartments', '8223 W Floyd Ave, Lakewood, CO, 80227', 'k5ugn8XO']
